title: Login Button Alignment Issue
description: The login button is misaligned on smaller screens, affecting user experience.

title: Data Import Error
description: Users encounter errors when importing large datasets. Investigation needed for optimization.

title: Broken Link in Navigation
description: One of the navigation links leads to a non-existent page. Update link destination.

title: Payment Gateway Integration Issue
description: Transactions fail intermittently. Investigate and fix issues with the payment gateway integration.

title: Mobile Responsiveness Problem
description: Certain pages are not fully responsive on mobile devices. Optimize for various screen sizes.

title: User Profile Update Error
description: Users are unable to update their profile information. Investigate and resolve the issue.

title: Search Functionality Not Working
description: The search feature is returning incorrect or no results. Debug and enhance search functionality.

title: Email Notification Delay
description: Users are experiencing delays in receiving email notifications. Investigate and optimize email sending process.

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility Issue
description: Certain features do not work as expected in Internet Explorer. Ensure compatibility across major browsers.

title: Error Handling in Checkout Process
description: Inconsistent error messages during checkout. Standardize error handling for a smoother user experience.
